suspicious_activity.narrative: Between February and July 2025, Jacqueline Rodriguez (ID: CUST_0111) conducted numerous transactions, including four large wire transfers just below the $10,000 threshold on July 30 and 31, 2025. These transactions, totaling $49,527.51, appear to be structured to avoid reporting requirements. Given the customer's high-risk status and the nature of these transactions, they warrant further investigation.
